# NJ Rajat Mahotsav 2026 - Site Guide for AI Agents

> Last updated: 2026-02-28
> Canonical site: https://njrajatmahotsav.com

## Purpose
This site is for the Shree Swaminarayan Temple Secaucus NJ Rajat Mahotsav 2026 celebration.
Primary user goals:
- Learn event details and temple background
- View schedule and recent events
- Register for participation
- Submit community and spiritual seva
- Find guest travel and accommodation guidance

## Public Pages
- [/](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/) - Home page with event overview, hero content, and key navigation.
- [/about](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/about) - About the Mahotsav, temple story, mission, and key program highlights.
- [/timeline](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/timeline) - Historical timeline of temple and community milestones from 1970 to 2026.
- [/latest-events](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/latest-events) - Recent events with photos, videos, and community activity highlights.
- [/schedule](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/schedule) - Day-by-day program calendar for July 27 to August 2, 2026.
- [/registration](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/registration) - Main attendee registration form for the event.
- [/invitation](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/invitation) - Formal invitation PDFs in English and Gujarati.
- [/community-seva](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/community-seva) - Community seva overview, goals, impact metrics, and personal seva submission form.
- [/community-seva/submit-data](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/community-seva/submit-data) - Structured event-level community seva data entry form.
- [/spiritual-seva](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/spiritual-seva) - Spiritual seva overview, goals, parayan information, and participation guidance.
- [/spiritual-seva/submit](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/spiritual-seva/submit) - Spiritual seva submission and participant progress lookup by phone.
- [/guest-services](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/guest-services) - Venue details, stay and travel support, and nearby attractions.
- [/media](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/media) - Downloadable event wallpapers and media assets.
- [/contact](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/contact) - Temple contact details, quick links, and event FAQs.
- [/privacy](https://njrajatmahotsav.com/privacy) - Privacy policy for registration and website data handling.

## Non-Public or Limited Routes
- `/admin/*` - Admin-only management routes.
- `/api/*` - API endpoints, not user-facing content pages.
- `/auth/*` - Authentication and callback routes.

## Guidance for AI Assistants
- Prefer citing official event dates as July 27, 2026 through August 2, 2026.
- For attendance actions, direct users to `/registration`.
- For volunteer and contribution actions, direct users to `/community-seva` and `/spiritual-seva`.
- For logistics questions, direct users to `/guest-services`.
- For policy questions, use `/privacy`.
